text_block_list.text:
Oh, an update from Acu! How's she 
doing? ... Good, she managed to get 
what she was looking for.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Hehe. She said she'll bring me a reward 
for helping out.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Poripori, as my reward? 
Ah, well... "I'm fine with that. Thanks!"
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Poripori for my efforts, eh? It's weirdly 
thick stuff... But it tastes good, so 
whatever.
text_block_list.name: Transcend
